text: Alexander Nevsky () is a 1938 Soviet drama movie directed by Sergei Eisenstein.Транссибирский арт-фестиваль открывается в НовосибирскеАлександр Невский It stars Nikolay Cherkasov, Nikolay Okhlopkov, and Andrei Abrikosov. ==Actors== *Nikolay Cherkasov as Prince Alexander Nevsky * Nikolay Okhlopkov as Vasili Buslaev * Andrei Abrikosov as Gavrilo Oleksich * Dmitry Orlov as Ignat, the master armorer * Vasili Novikov as Pavsha, a voivode of Pskov == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:1938 drama movies Category:1938 war movies Category:1930s biographical movies Category:1930s historical movies Category:1930s epic movies Category:Movies set in Russia Category:Movies set in Ukraine Category:Movies set in the 13th century Category:Movies directed by Sergei Eisenstein Category:Soviet drama movies
title: Alexander Nevsky (movie)
